actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for collegiate housing and infrastructure grants.
short_title: Collegiate Housing and Infrastructure Act of 2007

summary.text: Collegiate Housing and Infrastructure Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow tax-exempt charitable or educational organizations to make collegiate housing and infrastructure improvement grants to certain tax-exempt social clubs (e.g., college fraternities and sororities) so long as all of the active members of such clubs are full-time students at the college or university with which such clubs are associated. Defines "collegiate housing and infrastructure grants" to include grants to provide, improve, operate, or maintain collegiate housing.

titles.title: Collegiate Housing and Infrastructure Act of 2007
Collegiate Housing and Infrastructure Act of 2007
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for collegiate housing and infrastructure grants.
